operations.command: echo "Document Year Citation Analysis:" && echo "" && for year_range in "pre-2020" "2020-2023" "2024-2026"; do echo "=== $year_range ===" && case $year_range in "pre-2020") pattern="(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])" ;; "2020-2023") pattern="(2020|2021|2022|2023)" ;; "2024-2026") pattern="(2024|2025|2026)" ;; esac && for doc in "MEGA_SYNTHESIS_2026.md" "meta-meta-systems-research.md" "trading_ml_research_final_2026.md" "market_regime_detection_sota_2025.md" "luxalgo_roi_swot_ranking.md"; do count=$(grep -oE "$pattern" "docs/research/$doc" 2>/dev/null | wc -l) && echo "$doc: $count mentions" done && echo "" done

echo "trading_ml pre-2020:" && grep -oE '\b(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])\b' docs/research/trading_ml_research_final_2026.md | wc -l && echo "trading_ml 2020-2023:" && grep -oE '\b(2020|2021|2022|2023)\b' docs/research/trading_ml_research_final_2026.md | wc -l && echo "trading_ml 2024-2026:" && grep -oE '\b(2024|2025|2026)\b' docs/research/trading_ml_research_final_2026.md | wc -l
operations.description: Count citations by era for trading_ml

operations.command: echo "market_regime pre-2020:" && grep -oE '\b(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])\b' docs/research/market_regime_detection_sota_2025.md | wc -l && echo "market_regime 2020-2023:" && grep -oE '\b(2020|2021|2022|2023)\b' docs/research/market_regime_detection_sota_2025.md | wc -l && echo "market_regime 2024-2026:" && grep -oE '\b(2024|2025|2026)\b' docs/research/market_regime_detection_sota_2025.md | wc -l
operations.description: Count citations by era for market_regime

operations.command: echo "research_vs_repos pre-2020:" && grep -oE '\b(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])\b' specs/028-validation/research_vs_repos_analysis.md | wc -l && echo "research_vs_repos 2020-2023:" && grep -oE '\b(2020|2021|2022|2023)\b' specs/028-validation/research_vs_repos_analysis.md | wc -l && echo "research_vs_repos 2024-2026:" && grep -oE '\b(2024|2025|2026)\b' specs/028-validation/research_vs_repos_analysis.md | wc -l
operations.description: Count citations by era for research_vs_repos

operations.command: echo "meta-meta pre-2020:" && grep -oE '\b(198[0-9]|199[0-9]|200[0-9]|201[0-9])\b' docs/research/meta-meta-systems-research.md | wc -l && echo "meta-meta 2020-2023:" && grep -oE '\b(2020|2021|2022|2023)\b' docs/research/meta-meta-systems-research.md | wc -l && echo "meta-meta 2024-2026:" && grep -oE '\b(2024|2025|2026)\b' docs/research/meta-meta-systems-research.md | wc -l
operations.description: Count citations by era for meta-meta
Get line counts for all documents

operations.command: echo "=== Cross-References Analysis ===" && echo "" && echo "MEGA_SYNTHESIS sources:" && grep -i "sources:" docs/research/MEGA_SYNTHESIS_2026.md | head -3 && echo "" && echo "trading_ml cites MEGA_SYNTHESIS:" && grep -i "mega" docs/research/trading_ml_research_final_2026.md | head -3 && echo "" && echo "research_vs_repos cites others:" && grep -iE "(mega|transcendent|master)" specs/028-validation/research_vs_repos_analysis.md | head -5
